text:
Heyy Sandra, yes choosing Btec course was definitely a great idea as it developing my skills further. Now im able to present my ideas in front of large audiences, being able to speak and presenting myself. It has also helped me to organise an actual project to get experience on how real life project take place where we dont have clue apart of having food in the wedding or any other event. It just gave ma insight of how things work in the real word. 
Moreover, i have been thinking to apply for apprenticeship? Is there any thoughts you might want to share..
